name: Those Dam Beavers
description:
Evil mutated beavers are building dams and blocking the city's water supply! Destroy the dams to reconnect the city to its water!

Built in 10 days for the Godot Wild Jam #21!

I will be updating it all weekend, so please give me any and all feedback! I want to make the best game I can make in 10 days.

Destroy the beaver dams blocking the city's water supply while fighting off ravenous beavers!

All art and development was done by me (chefal). Credits contains attribution for free assets I've used.
